metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010180 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: GNU gdb All versions is affected by: Buffer Overflow - Out of bound memory access. The impact is: Deny of Service, Memory Disclosure, and Possible Code Execution. The component is: The main gdb module. The attack vector is: Open an ELF for debugging. The fixed version is: Not fixed yet.

notes.Note: leosilva> the patch only prints a warning about the issue, it does not fix it.

criterions.comment: gdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
